# File lib/ramaze/request.rb, line 104
    def pretty_print(pp)
      pp.object_group(self){
        group = { 'params' => params, 'cookies' => cookies, 'env' => http_variables }
        group.each do |name, hash|
          pp.breakable
          pp.text " @#{name}="
          pp.nest(name.size + 3){ pp.pp_hash(hash) }
        end
      }
    end
